reviewText: When they say basic, they mean BASIC. If you have never, ever looked under the plastics on an ATV, this might be for you. But then, the guy that narrates this DVD is sooo monotone and un-animated you will probably turn it off in the first 5 minutes. Seriously folks, this is like watching an Army training film. It covers things like how to wash out an air filter, and how to air up tires, and charging the battery. Thats about as far as it goes. If you don't know how to do these things, then I say go for it....
